name: Multicross Puzzle Challenge
description:
Multicross is new puzzle game designed by Tetris creator – Alexey Pajitnov.

Multicross features:
• Fun and simple gameplay;
• 600+600+600 challenge puzzles of 3 types;
• 15 new challenges every day;
• Stylish visuals, music and sound effects

How to play main game:
• Drag a shape from bottom pool onto vacant space of the playing field;
• Form the full line of blocks either horizontally or vertically to score and clean it up;
• Build crossing lines to obtain better score, as well as to clear entire playing field;
• Increase blocks’ price placing same color blocks on the playing field;
• Collect stars in challenges to increase main score multiplier;
• Keep the blocks from filling the playfield.

How to play FILL challenge:
• Drag a shape from bottom pool onto vacant space of the playing field;
• Fill the whole playing field with blocks;
• Collect stars to increase main score multiplier.

How to play ROTATE challenge:
• Tap a shape in stack to rotate before placing it onto vacant space of the playing field.

How to play MIRROR challenge:
• Tap a shape in stack to flip it horizontally before placing it onto vacant space of the playing field.

Shape your mind while mastering the shapes of new game from Puzzle Guru – Alexey Pajitnov.
